channel.title: How could i play online my server by myself?
channel.description: Hello i wanted to know what i need to do to be able to play on my rsps server, just myself and no one else. Ive checked all the server ip's and they all say "127.0.0.1" which is localhost, but its not letting me be able to login to my own server. Could someone help me to be able to do this? Thank you ! :(

item.title: How could i play online my server by myself?
item.dc:creator: @JoelxDM JoelxDM
item.description:
@JoelxDM wrote:

I did run it oviously but i get connection lost when i try and sign in . it logs me in but doesent allow me to actually play. Just stays on blackscreen and auto signs me out.

Read full topic
